headline: In Ohio GOP Senate race, candidates play on Trumpiness without Trump
author: Rick Rouan
sentences: GROVE CITY, Ohio  In the waning days of Ohios bruising Republican primary for an open U.S. Senate seat, Don Cary was still on the fence.

Vance is the favorite to win Ohio's Republican Senate primary Tuesday after nabbing Donald Trump's endorsement.
Ohio Republicans will select their Senate nominee Tuesday in a race to succeed retiring Rob Portman.
Given Trump's popularity among Ohio Republicans, Vance's GOP rivals are promoting their Trump ties.

But Cary felt he had to reconsider when Trump set aside those comments to back Vance.
